{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Onion |model=Omega 2 |revision=(OM-02) |upc=636276892201 |price=5 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |est_release_date=12/2016 |fcc_date=10/10/2016 |fcc_id=2AJVP-OMEGA2 |type=wireless embedded board |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_conn=non-standard |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7688A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7688A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=easily accessible GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;4.4.32;LEDE Reboot r2292+1; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Omega-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=Omega-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.3.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=onioneer |oui=40:A3:6B |oui_eth=40:A3:6B }}
*[https://docs.onion.io/omega2-docs/ Onion Omega2 Documentation] for details on available Docks and Expansions
*[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/onion/omega2-5-iot-computer-with-wi-fi-powered-by-linux '''KICKSTARTER''' project for the device] *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/omega2-5-linux-computer-with-wi-fi-made-for-iot#/ '''Indiegogo''' project for the device]
